OPTION.NAME: AREGS
OPTION.DESC: Enables absolute register (ARn) addressing

OPTION.NAME: BROWSE
OPTION.DESC: Enables source browser information

OPTION.NAME: CODE
OPTION.DESC: Includes generated assembly in the listing file

OPTION.NAME: DEBUG
OPTION.DESC: Includes debugging information in the object file

OPTION.NAME: OBJECTEXTEND
OPTION.DESC: Adds additional debugging information to the object file

OPTION.NAME: OPTIMIZE
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the level of optimization performed by the compiler. OPTIMIZE (8, SPEED)

OPTION.NAME: PREPRINT
OPTION.DESC: Produces a preprocessor listing file with expanded macros

OPTION.NAME: ROM(
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the ROM model (SMALL, COMPACT or LARGE)

OPTION.NAME: BANK
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the code bank in which to locate the specified segment.

OPTION.NAME: BANKAREA
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the address range where code banks are located.

OPTION.NAME: BIT
OPTION.DESC: Locates BIT segments.

OPTION.NAME: CODE
OPTION.DESC: Locates CODE segments.

OPTION.NAME: DATA
OPTION.DESC: Locates DATA segments.

OPTION.NAME: DISABLEWARNING
OPTION.DESC: Disables generation of specified warning numbers. BL51 myfile.obj DW(20,22)

OPTION.NAME: IBANKING
OPTION.DESC: Uses the on-chip code banking hardware of the Mentor M8051EW core, the Infineon SDA30C16x/26x, and the Micronas SDA555x.

OPTION.NAME: IDATA
OPTION.DESC: Locates IDATA segments.

OPTION.NAME: IXREF
OPTION.DESC: Enables cross reference details in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: NOAJMP
OPTION.DESC: Avoids AJMP instructions in bank switch code.

OPTION.NAME: NOAMAKE
OPTION.DESC: Excludes AMAKE information from the object file.

OPTION.NAME: NODEBUGLINES
OPTION.DESC: Excludes line number information from the output object file.

OPTION.NAME: NODEBUGPUBLICS
OPTION.DESC: Excludes public symbol information from the output object file.

OPTION.NAME: NODEBUGSYMBOLS
OPTION.DESC: Excludes local symbol information from the output object file.

OPTION.NAME: NODEFAULTLIBRARY
OPTION.DESC: Disables automatic inclusion of run-time library routines.

OPTION.NAME: NOINDIRECTCALL
OPTION.DESC: Disables bank switching code for indirectly called functions.

OPTION.NAME: NOJMPTAB
OPTION.DESC: Disables generation of the code banking jump table.

OPTION.NAME: NOLINES
OPTION.DESC: Excludes line number information from the listing file and object file.

OPTION.NAME: NOMAP
OPTION.DESC: Excludes the memory map from the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: NOOVERLAY
OPTION.DESC: Disables data segment overlaying.

OPTION.NAME: NOPRINT
OPTION.DESC: Disables generation of the listing (MAP) file.

OPTION.NAME: NOPUBLICS
OPTION.DESC: Excludes public symbols from the listing file and object file.

OPTION.NAME: NOSORTSIZE
OPTION.DESC: Disables sorting sections by size prior to locating.

OPTION.NAME: NOSYMBOLS
OPTION.DESC: Excludes local symbols from the listing file and object file.

OPTION.NAME: OVERLAY
OPTION.DESC: Modifies the call tree for overlaying of local bit and data segments.

OPTION.NAME: PAGELENGTH
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: PAGEWIDTH
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: PDATA
OPTION.DESC: Locates PDATA segments.

OPTION.NAME: PRECEDE
OPTION.DESC: Locates segments in DATA memory prior to other relocatable BIT, DATA, and IDATA segments.

OPTION.NAME: PRINT
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the name of the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: RAMSIZE(
OPTION.DESC: RAMSIZE(256): Specifies the number of bytes of DATA and IDATA

OPTION.NAME: RECURSIONS
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the maximum number of recursive calls detected before link failure.

OPTION.NAME: REGFILE
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the name of the register definition file for global register coloring.

OPTION.NAME: RTX51
OPTION.DESC: Specifies that the RTX51 Real-Time Kernel is used.

OPTION.NAME: RTX51TINY
OPTION.DESC: Specifies that the RTX51 Tiny Real-Time Kernel is used.

OPTION.NAME: SPEEDOVL
OPTION.DESC: Ignores references from constant segments to program segments during overlay analysis.

OPTION.NAME: STACK
OPTION.DESC: Locates segments in the uppermost IDATA memory space.

OPTION.NAME: XDATA
OPTION.DESC: Locates XDATA segments.

OPTION.NAME: CASE
OPTION.DESC: Enables case-sensitive symbol names.

OPTION.NAME: COND
OPTION.DESC: Includes (in the listing file) conditional source lines skipped by the preprocessor.

OPTION.NAME: DATE
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the date to use in the listing file header.

OPTION.NAME: DEBUG
OPTION.DESC: Includes debugging information in the object file

OPTION.NAME: DEFINE
OPTION.DESC: Defines C preprocessor symbols on the command line.

OPTION.NAME: ECRM
OPTION.DESC: Allow expansion of generic CALL instruction to ECALL for the NXP 80C51MX devices.

OPTION.NAME: ELSE
OPTION.DESC: Assemble block if the condition of a previous IF is false.

OPTION.NAME: ELSEIF
OPTION.DESC: Assemble block if condition is true and a previous IF or ELSEIF is false.

OPTION.NAME: ENDIF
OPTION.DESC: Ends an IF block.

OPTION.NAME: ERRORPRINT
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the file name for error messages.

OPTION.NAME: GEN
OPTION.DESC: Includes all macro expansions in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: IF
OPTION.DESC: Assemble block if condition is true.

OPTION.NAME: INCDIR
OPTION.DESC: Sets additional include file paths.

OPTION.NAME: INCLUDE
OPTION.DESC: Includes the contents of another file.

OPTION.NAME: LIST
OPTION.DESC: Includes the assembly source text in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: MACRO
OPTION.DESC: Enables preprocessor expansion of standard macros.

OPTION.NAME: MOD_CONT
OPTION.DESC: Enables 24-bit contiguous addressing for Dallas Semiconductor devices.

OPTION.NAME: MOD_MX51
OPTION.DESC: Enables instruction set extensions for the NXP 80C51MX architecture.

OPTION.NAME: MOD51
OPTION.DESC: Enables code generation and defines SFRs for classic 8051 devices.

OPTION.NAME: MPL
OPTION.DESC: Enables preprocessor expansion of MPL macros.

OPTION.NAME: NOAMAKE
OPTION.DESC: Excludes build information from the object file.

OPTION.NAME: NOCASE
OPTION.DESC: Disables case-sensitive symbol names. All symbols are converted to uppercase.

OPTION.NAME: NOCOND
OPTION.DESC: Excludes (from the listing file) conditional source lines skipped by the preprocessor.

OPTION.NAME: NODEBUG
OPTION.DESC: Excludes debugging information from the object file.

OPTION.NAME: NOERRORPRINT
OPTION.DESC: Disables error messages output to the screen.

OPTION.NAME: NOGEN
OPTION.DESC: Excludes macro expansions from the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: NOLINES
OPTION.DESC: Excludes line number information from the generated object module.

OPTION.NAME: NOLIST
OPTION.DESC: Excludes the assembly source text from the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: NOMACRO
OPTION.DESC: Disables preprocessor expansion of standard and MPL macros.

OPTION.NAME: NOMOD51
OPTION.DESC: Suppresses SFRs definitions for classic 8051 devices

OPTION.NAME: NOMPL
OPTION.DESC: Disables preprocessor expansion of MPL macros.

OPTION.NAME: NOOBJECT
OPTION.DESC: Disables object file generation.

OPTION.NAME: NOPRINT
OPTION.DESC: Disables listing file generation.

OPTION.NAME: NOREGISTERBANK
OPTION.DESC: Disables memory space reservation for register banks.

OPTION.NAME: NOSYMBOLS
OPTION.DESC: Excludes the symbol table from the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: NOSYMLIST
OPTION.DESC: Excludes subsequently defined symbols from the symbol table.

OPTION.NAME: NOXREF
OPTION.DESC: Excludes the cross-reference table from the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: OBJECT
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the name for the object file.

OPTION.NAME: PAGELENGTH
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the number of lines on a page in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: PAGEWIDTH
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the number of characters on a line in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: PRINT
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the name for the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: REGISTERBANK
OPTION.DESC: Reserves memory space for register banks.

OPTION.NAME: REGUSE
OPTION.DESC: Specifies registers modified by the specified function.

OPTION.NAME: RESET
OPTION.DESC: Sets symbols, which may be tested by IF or ELSEIF, to false.

OPTION.NAME: SET
OPTION.DESC: Sets symbols, which may be tested by IF or ELSEIF, to true or a specified value.

OPTION.NAME: SYMBOLS
OPTION.DESC: Includes a symbol table in the listing file

OPTION.NAME: SYMLIST
OPTION.DESC: Includes subsequently defined symbols in the symbol table.

OPTION.NAME: TITLE
OPTION.DESC: Specifies the page header title in the listing file.

OPTION.NAME: XREF
OPTION.DESC: Includes the cross-reference table in the listing file.
